goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions

Class TestCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions.TestCondition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Always, AtEnd, AtStart, Eventually, Never, Until, While

    public abstract class TestCondition
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base for any test condition. Test conditions are evaluated in the context of a running agent and need to provide an evaluator that can do so.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

    • Field Detail

      • query

        protected final MentalStateCond query
        The mental state condition of the query

      • nested

        protected TestCondition nested
        An optional nested condition (... -> ...)

      • isNested

        protected java.util.Set<Substitution> isNested
        Null when a condition is not nested; Empty set when a condition is nested but not active (e.g. condition not met); Filled set when a condition is nested and active (condition met) > all substitutions in the set need to be evaluated.

      • boundByMe

        protected final java.util.Set<Var> boundByMe
        The (unbound) variables that were bound whilst evaluating this condition

      • evaluator

        protected TestConditionEvaluator evaluator
        The actual evaluator for the conditions

      • getBoundByMe

        public java.util.Set<Var> getBoundByMe()

      • provideEvaluator

        public final TestConditionEvaluator provideEvaluator(RunState<? extends ObservableDebugger> runstate,
                                      Substitution substitution)
        Provides an evaluator capable of evaluating the mental state query on a running agent. The runstate is provided as an argument because it is not available through the ObservableDebugger. This function uses createEvaluator to create the initial evaluator initially, and returns the existing instance otherwise.
        Parameters:
        runstate - of the agent
        substitution - the substitution to share
        Returns:
        a new evaluator

      • createEvaluator

        public abstract TestConditionEvaluator createEvaluator(RunState<? extends ObservableDebugger> runstate,
                                     Substitution substitution)
        Provides an evaluator capable of evaluating the mental state query on a running agent. The runstate is provided as an argument because it is not available through the ObservableDebugger. This function should actually create the evaluator's implementation.
        Parameters:
        runstate - of the agent
        substitution - the substitution to share
        Returns:
        a new evaluator

      • accept

        public abstract <T> T accept(ResultFormatter<T> formatter)
        Uses double dispatch to call the formatter.
        Parameters:
        formatter - to call
        Returns:
        result of the formatter
